alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL WARE...EAST CENTRAL CLINCH AND NORTHWESTERN CHARLTON COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stephen Foster State Park, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Stephen Foster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
